howls,

6678.85.text: And makes night hideous—answer him, ye owls.'

6679.13.text: To this the poet adds the following note:

6679.44.text:
'James Ralph, a name inserted after the first
editions,

6679.79.text:
not known till he writ a swearing-piece called
_Sawney_,

6680.14.text: very abusive of Dr. Swift, Mr. Gay, and myself.'"]
